action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 matrix with the following pattern of X's and blank squares (▢):
1. The first row has an X in the first and last positions.
2. The second row has an X in the first and fourth positions.
3. The third row has three X's in the first, second, and third positions.
4. The fourth row has an X in the first and fourth positions.
5. The fifth row has an X in the first and last positions.
All other positions are blank squares.
continue

All other positions are blank (▢).
